item.title: Along the new cycle path, there are multiple pockets of gravel and debris. From West Approach Drive up to the race course needs regular sweeping, 29th October

item.title: Several very deep potholes in Dog Lane - getting worse and dangerous for bikes, horses cars and pedestrians.ane to t, 29th October

item.title: Damaged 50mph sign and post North of New Rd Old Rd Jct, 29th October
item.description:
50mph speed limit repeater sign that has twisted on its post on the western side of the B4632 North of the New Road /Old Junction. As such it is failing to convey the prevailing 50mph speed limit to passing drivers and riders. This in turn could lead to increased vehicle speeds and a greater risk of collisions occurring.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)
